subject: Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: It will be hard, if not impossible, for Gareth Bale to post better numbers than Cristiano Ronaldo, but much of Bale’s game is making the team, and not just himself, better.
snippet: It will be hard, if not impossible, for Gareth Bale to post better numbers than Cristiano Ronaldo, but much of Bale’s game is making the team, and not just himself, better.
